name: @date-fns/example-rollup
description: Example of date-fns usage with Rollup
author: Sasha Koss <koss@nocorp.me>

scripts.build: pnpm run build-date-fns && pnpm run build-rollup
scripts.stats-size:
echo "Minimal size: $(gzip-size dist/minimal.js)
Format size: $(gzip-size dist/example.js)
FP size: $(gzip-size dist/fp.js)
Misc size: $(gzip-size dist/misc.js)"
scripts.test: pnpm run test-example && pnpm run test-fp && pnpm run test-misc && pnpm run test-constants
